sentences.sContent: She was depressed and almost suicidal.
For many years before treatment, Clare had suicidal tendencies (= behaviour that showed she wanted to kill herself ) .
sentences.sCn: 在治疗前的许多年里，克莱尔都有自杀倾向。

synos.tran: 自杀的，自杀性的；自我毁灭的；自取灭亡的

remMethod.val: sui(自己) ＋ cid(杀) + al(形容词后缀) → 自杀(性)的

trans.tranCn: 自杀的； 有自杀倾向的
